channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023061493
item.description:
Report X-2023061493

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: SALEM
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box found on side in trailer with wet stain. Box put in red tote and place upright. DescribePack: Items not facing upright which caused one bottle to be dented and leak from cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: items places upright and cap tightened.

item.title: Report X-2023061490
item.description:
Report X-2023061490

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: SALEM
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The powder was leaking out. The package was placed in a tote and brought to QA. QA inspected it. DescribePack: There was no packing material in the package to protect the items. There were no markings on the Outer package to indicate orientation or Hazardous material. the lid failed, allowing the powder to spill out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was inspected and the item was placed upright. The powder was cleaned up.

item.title: Report X-2023061487
item.description:
Report X-2023061487

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA leaking. Unsure what cause the damage. Leaking package was placed in hazmat bin. DescribePack: Outer packaging was not glued together well enough to hold inner packaging in place. Causing inner packaging to fall out and become damaged and leak from the caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: bottles were turned right side up to stop leaking, and pads used to clean up what spilled.

item.title: Report X-2023061470
item.description:
Report X-2023061470

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-06
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package noticed to be stained and wet DescribePack: Inspection revealed inner jerrycan had loose air hole cap allowing liquid to leak. Product dissolved the glue of the safety seal under the loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in tote to contain leakage

item.title: Report X-2023070245
item.description:
Report X-2023070245

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS RESPONDED TO BY ANOTHER RESPONDER IN DOOR AND RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. AN SDS SEARCH INDICATED THAT THE PACKAGE MAY BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT (UN 1760, CORROSIVE LIQUIDS, N.O.S.(UREA, MONOHYDROCHLORIDE), 8, III). RMP WAS NOTIFIED OF THE SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT AND CONTACTED THE HMSC TO REPORT THE INCIDENT. HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report X-2023061225
item.description:
Report X-2023061225

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat and secured it in a salvage drum. DescribePack: Upon inspection, all four plastic bottles were leaking from loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Closures were tightened to make sure liquid could no longer escape.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat and was quickly secured in a salvage drum. DescribePack: Upon inspection, found that two bottles were dented and all bottles had leakage from the caps while also soling all bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was quickly secured in a salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023061139
item.description:
Report X-2023061139

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-17T15:10:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat and package was secured in a salvage drum. DescribePack: Upon inspection, one bottle of degreaser had a loose cap and was leaking. Soiling this package in the process. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Closures were tightened to insure no more liquid could leak out.
